author: samwilsn
content:
<@360491619402776577> What do <@830368514225340436> <@243183686562873344> and myself need to do to get EELS fuzzed? We have the [trace options](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/de0977363e7e491faffc6f1fd166bc924c9ae5d8/src/ethereum_spec_tools/evm_tools/t8n/__init__.py#L67-L72) implemented in our t8n tool.

Should we \*shudders\* schedule a call?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: You need to add code to call your evm tool here: https://github.com/holiman/goevmlab/tree/master/evms

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: You need to add code to call your evm tool here: https://github.com/holiman/goevmlab/tree/master/evms

author: samwilsn
content: Would `geth.go` be the one to copy?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: yes, well ideally you would implement a batch mode, like gethbatch, but for starters making something like geth.go would be great
